content.text: Let's learn how to talk about your daily routine, or 'la routine quotidienne', in French. We'll start with the morning.

data.tip: The 'eille' at the end sounds like the 'ay' in 'say'. The 'r' sound is made in the back of your throat.

content.text: To say what time you do something, use the structure: 'à' + number + 'heures'.
Use 'à' for open transport like 'à vélo' (by bike) and 'en' for enclosed transport like 'en train' (by train).

content.title: Talking about your morning
content.setting: Your French friend, Léa, asks about your morning routine.

conversation_flow.title: Say what time you wake up
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Salut ! Pour ta routine, tu te réveilles à quelle heure ?

conversation_flow.title: Mention what you eat or drink for breakfast
Explain how you travel to work
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Miam ! Et tu vas au travail comment ?

content.text: Great! Now let's talk about the rest of your day. Remember, 'midi' means noon.

data.tip: The 'i' sound in 'finis' is like the 'ee' in 'see', but shorter and sharper.

content.title: Discussing your work day
content.setting: The conversation with Léa continues. You just told her how you get to work.

conversation_flow.title: State what time you start working
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Super ! Tu commences le travail à quelle heure ?

conversation_flow.title: Say what time you usually have lunch
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ok. Et tu déjeunes à quelle heure ?

conversation_flow.title: Mention what time you finish your work day
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Et tu finis le travail à quelle heure ?

content.text: Excellent! Finally, let's learn how to talk about your evening activities.
To easily ask the same question back to someone, you can just say 'Et toi ?'.

content.title: Chatting about your evening
content.setting: You've told Léa about your work schedule. Now she asks about your evening.

conversation_flow.title: Describe what you typically do after work
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: D'accord. Et après le travail, tu fais quoi ?

conversation_flow.title: Say what time you usually eat dinner
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah, c'est bien. Et tu dînes à quelle heure ?

conversation_flow.title: Ask about their routine in return
Acknowledge her response
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Moi ? Ma routine est très différente. Merci !
